name: orderliness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being well arranged or organized: Patients are complimentary about the cleanliness and orderliness of the hospital. The orderliness of the room surprised him. See
orderly
More examplesFewer examplesI loved the orderliness of their little bungalow.International observers praised the orderliness of Sunday's election.The center's orderliness is impressive.
